greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Iteration of (k terms=k, followed by 2^k-k terms=0), beginning with k=0.
comment: For n with 2^k - 1 <= n < 2^k + k-1: a(n) = k;
formula: a(n) = f(n,0) with f(n,k) = if n<2^k then (if n<k then k else 0) else f(n-2^k,k+1).
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 24 2009
